title: Understanding Assisted Dying
text: Assisted dying involves a deliberate action to end a life. Consider the context in which this action is taken.

title: Legal Aspects of Assisted Dying
text: Assisted dying is often associated with legal and ethical considerations. Think about who is involved in the process and under what circumstances it is allowed.
